name: graphql-api-adobecommerce
description: Newman project dedicated to all graphQl queries and mutiations that are avaliable on Adobe commerce native.

scripts.native_apis: newman run collections/GraphQL_Adobe_Commerce_collection.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-darkTheme --reporter-html-template=report --reporter-htmlextra-title 'Magento Native GraphQl APIs Tests' --insecure -e
